alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Ojai Valley; Palos Verdes Hills; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Santa Susana Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western San Fernando Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 3:45AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The coasts and valleys of Ventura and Los Angeles counties as well as the Santa Barbara south coast and Santa Ynez range. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
